desc: Ideal for baby led weaning (BLW) or messy play, the Food Catcher and Messy Mealtime Smock are the perfect solution for protecting your child’s clothes and catching food or toys dropped or thrown from the high chair. Made of durable, waterproof, machine-washable, easy to clean fabric. Save mess, clean less!

layout.text: NEVER FUSS OVER MESSY MEALTIMES AGAIN.
